# Hyperbolic two-way travel time

```r
hyperbolicTWT(t0, antsep, v)
```

## Arguments

- `t0`: (`numeric`) two-way travel time when `a` = 0 (zero-offset)
- `antsep`: (`numeric`) antenna separation
- `v`: (`numeric`) layer velocity (vrms)

## Returns

(`numeric`) two-way travel time

Returns two-way travel time as a function of antenna separation, two-way travel time at zero-offset, and wave velocity in the medium
